Content: Hello everyone, I have a 2000 kawasaki ninja zx6r that sat for 13 years, and I am finding a hanging rev at 5000-6000 rpm when I set my idle screw to proper position according to manual. When i unscrew the idle screw, it revs no problem, just won't go to idle. Is this a throttle issue and a sign I need new throttle cables or something with the carbs.

Title: ZX6R Throttle Issue
